page.title: 06SETTLEMENT CHANGES cont.
page.content: 3) Many {retired} people moving to Worthing and the south coast. 4) Town planners recently tried to encourage {young families }to stay in Worthing area, hence the Tesco develpment area, new College of Technology , both built in the 1970's. 5) {New Employment} schemes e.g. College of Technology, Beechams etc. (See separate page on employment). + new large {schools. { {PROBLEMS IN COMPILING THE DATA: 1) The map makers themselves who often made mistakes of accuracy 2) The problem of translating inaccurately drawn maps onto modern ordnance survey maps. 3) The large gap in available maps especially in the 20th century itself that the reference library would allow us to look at.
